```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
data2021Jan <-
  readxl::read_xls("./rawdata/monthly_exports_bytypes_2021.xls", 
                   sheet = 4,
                   range = "C11:C40",
                   col_names = "January")

data2021Feb <-
  readxl::read_xls("./rawdata/monthly_exports_bytypes_2021.xls", 
                   sheet = 5,
                   range = "C11:C40",
                   col_names = "Feburary")

data2021Mar <-
  readxl::read_xls("./rawdata/monthly_exports_bytypes_2021.xls", 
                   sheet = 6,
                   range = "C11:C40",
                   col_names = "March")
```
